gvr:validationOverview.gvr:validatorID: .Structuration minimale des documents de santé v1.15
gvr:validationOverview.gvr:additionalMetadata: This report is a partial report ; only constraints of severity higher or equals to WARNING are included. The full report can be requested using severity parameter at INFO level.

gvr:constraint.gvr:constraintDescription: (SMDS_CDAClinicalDocument): [CI-SIS_StructurationMinimale] Dans un document CDA non structuré, le templateId 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.2.20 remplace le templateId du volet et seuls les trois templateId "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.2.20", "2.16.840.1.113883.2.8.2.1" et "1.2.250.1.213.1.1.1.1" sont admis
gvr:constraint.gvr:formalExpression: hl7:component/hl7:structuredBody or (hl7:component/hl7:nonXMLBody and (count(hl7:templateId)=3 and hl7:templateId[@root='2.16.840.1.113883.2.8.2.1'] and hl7:templateId[@root='1.2.250.1.213.1.1.1.1'] and hl7:templateId[@root='1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.2.20']))
